__e: She won't even let me talk to him. I mean, how messed up is that, right?
I'm not the bad guy here, you were nothing and nobody, and then you met me and the whole world gave you a shot, and you blew it.
Well, of course you do, Because you think you'll never find somebody like her again and you ruined it.
You fucked up my investigation and you wasted my time!
Oh, yeah, my husband ruined mine on my first date.
I know, and I'm telling you it sucked for me.
And of course, I'll have to tell her you're the one who ruined the surprise.
Yes.Your friend came in here, and as hard as it was for him to turn you in, he did the right thing by letting me know you were the one who but it wasn't me.I didn't do it.
You are going to stay in your room for two weeks and think about how your anger has screwed up your life and mine and how it's never going to happen again.
I'm doing this because you're the one who deserves to be angry and you need to know that you didn't screw this up.
No, I was gonna tell him yesterday, but then you ruined it.
I know Hank's a jerk, but that's the only thing I had, and now you screwed that up for good.
It was a shame he had to ruin the game, though, because I wasn't a bad little player.
Sounds like you blew what could have been the best night of your life.
You've ruined my car, and when you get home, I'm going to kill you!
You could have told them you destroyed my entire weekend.
But now I do know why you pissed all over my idea at the meeting.
I didn't do nothing to you.
-I've already talked to my father. And I'm gonna explain to my mother how the divorce is ruining my life.
All he ever did was shit on me and make me work long hours for him.
You've ruined my life once, two too many.
